work.name: Image & Signal Processing group, Universitat de Valencia
work.summary: Research on causal discovery, causal inference and machine learning applied to Earth system sciences.

thesis: Towards causal discovery for Earth system science

certificates.name: Deep Learning
certificates.issuer: Institute for research, development, training and advice

publications.name: Pairwise causal discovery with support measure machines.
publications.summary: Pairwise causal dicovey using ensembles and kernel mean embeddings.

publications.name: Recovering Latent Confounders from High-dimensional Proxy Variables.
publications.summary: Estimating latent confounders for causal effect estimation.

publications.name: Large language models for constrained-based causal discovery
publications.summary: Using large language models to aid in causal discovery.

publications.name: Discovering causal relations and equations from data
publications.summary: A technical review and survey of causal discovery and equation discovery for physics.

publications.name: Physics-aware nonparametric regression models for Earth data analysis
publications.summary: Non-parametric physics aware machine learning method.

publications.name: Learning latent functions for causal discovery
publications.summary: Bivariate causal discovery method for non-additive data with extension to time series

publications.name: Inferring causal relations from observational long-term carbon and water fluxes records
publications.summary: Causal discovery method for determnistic dynamic systems with applicationto carbon and water fluxes.

publications.name: Identifying the Causes of Pyrocumulonimbus (PyroCb)
publications.summary: Causal discovery tools for finding the causes of a binary target variable with application to Pyrocumulunimbus clouds.

publications.name: Pyrocast: a Machine Learning Pipeline to Forecast Pyrocumulonimbus (PyroCb) Clouds
publications.summary: A machine learning pipeline to forecast Pyrocumulunimbus clouds.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
